DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate clinical characteristic newly diagnose , drug naïve type 2 diabetic patient accord insulin secretion insulin resistance .
DOC.brief_title: Insulin Resistance Primary Pathogenesis Newly Diagnosed , Drug naïve Type 2 Diabetes Patients Korea
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objective : To investigate whether insulin resistance insulin deficiency primary pathogenesis type 2 diabetes mellitus Korea Secondary Objectives : To investigate proportion patient severe insulin deficiency diagnosis , To investigate proportion metabolic syndrome patient newly diagnose , drug-naïve type 2 diabetes mellitus , To investigate proportion obesity patient newly diagnose , drug-naïve type 2 diabetes mellitus
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnose , drug naïve type 2 DM patient give inform consent , Diagnosis type 2 DM make accord ADA guideline 2009 Exclusion Criteria : Patients age 18 year
